property.name: name_key
property.value: Bee Keeper - Intro

property.name: offer_key
property.value:
Dear Friend,
As you know the wasteland can be an unforgiving place for animals and insects, and from our observations you look like you could offer some help. Hereâ€™s a little guide to help to become a bee keeper. Think of it as your way of helping nature and helping me out. If you follow these steps, you will be able to craft and use all their resources to your liking.

 Good Luck and thank you, Gail

property.name: name_key
property.value: Bee Keeper - Save the Queen

property.name: description_key
property.value: Find a Queen Bee for Bee Hive

property.name: offer_key
property.value: In order to have a bee hive, you will need to find yourself a Queen Bee. But be carefull, the queen is always protected by it's guards.

property.name: name_key
property.value: Bee Keeper - Find the BeeKeeper

property.name: description_key
property.value: Find the beekeeper for Bee Hive parts.

property.name: offer_key
property.value: In order to have a bee hive, you will need to find the beekeeper. He is wondering arround in the wastland somewhere trying to sell his honey.

property.name: name_key
property.value: Bee Keeper - Suit Up!

property.name: description_key
property.value: Get your Bee Suit ready.

property.name: offer_key
property.value: In order to protect yourself from getting stinged by the bees you will need to get some gear!

property.name: name_key
property.value: Bee Keeper - Make a beehive.

property.name: description_key
property.value: In order to keep bees we will need a beehive.

property.name: offer_key
property.value: To make honey products we will need to provide our little workers with a nice beeHive to live in.

property.name: name_key
property.value: Bee Keeper - Lets get Sticky.

property.name: description_key
property.value: Time to gather some raw honey resources.

property.name: offer_key
property.value: It's time to get gather ray honey resources from your beehive in order to make some of your honey recipies.

property.name: name_key
property.value: Bee Keeper - Lets get Sticky.

property.name: description_key
property.value: Time to gather some raw honey resources.

property.name: offer_key
property.value: It's time to get gather ray honey resources from your beehive in order to make some of your honey recipies.

property.name: name_key
property.value: Bee Keeper - Find the cure!.

property.name: description_key
property.value: We are in urgent need of a cure against the .

property.name: name_key
property.value: Bee Keeper - Is there a Cure? 1.

property.name: description_key
property.value:
We've recently sent a team to the outer radiated zones.
We suspected there may be something there that can help us...
Unfortunately we lost contact with our team,
and we fear for the worse.
My sister was one of the team members,
and I was wondering if you could go look for him there.

And... ermmm... If she's infected, please make sure you free her...

Oh and if she's carying any serum,
make sure you bring it back with you!

property.name: name_key
property.value: Bee Keeper - Is there a Cure? 2.

property.name: description_key
property.value:
Well, shit... That's unfortunate about my brother.

However the syringe you brought back
is VERY interesting! This cures almost any disease...
Careful though, it's quite addictive!

Here, you keep that one.

Bye now, i'll keep investigating a definite cure!!

property.name: name_key
property.value: Bee Keeper - Show me the light

property.name: description_key
property.value: Everyone needs candles to light up the room in case your batteries die, or to make it gezellig.

property.name: offer_key
property.value: Make some bee wax candles to light up the room.
